mapper.select: select currentSemester, name, memberNo, deptName, jubun from tbl_member M inner join tbl_dept D on M.fk_deptseq = D.deptseq where memberno = #{memberNo}
select deptname from tbl_dept
select deptname from tbl_dept D inner join tbl_subject S on D.deptseq = S.fk_deptseq where subjectno = #{subjectno}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_course(courseno,semester,courseyear, fk_memberno, fk_subjectNo) values(tbl_course_seq.nextval, #{currentsemester}, #{year}, #{memberNo}, #{subjectno})
mapper.select: select count(fk_subjectno) from tbl_course where fk_memberno = #{memberNo} and fk_subjectno=#{subjectno} and recourse ='1'
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_course(courseno,semester,courseyear, fk_memberno, fk_subjectNo) values(tbl_course_seq.nextval, #{cursemester}, #{year}, #{memberno}, #{subjectno})
mapper.select: select count(fk_subjectno) from tbl_course where fk_memberno = #{memberNo} and fk_subjectno=#{subjectno} and recourse ='0'
mapper.update: update Tbl_Subject set Curpeoplecnt = Curpeoplecnt+1 where Subjectno = #{string}
mapper.select: select name, subjectname, credits, subjectno, day, period, peoplecnt, curpeoplecnt, courseno from ( select name, subjectno, subjectname, credits, day, period, peoplecnt, curpeoplecnt from tbl_subject S inner join tbl_professor P on S.fk_professorno = P.professorno ) V inner join tbl_course C on V.subjectno = C.fk_subjectno where fk_memberno = #{memberno} and courseyear = #{year} and semester = #{cursemester}
mapper.update: update Tbl_Subject set Curpeoplecnt = Curpeoplecnt-1 where Subjectno = #{subno}
mapper.select: select nvl(sum(credits),0) from tbl_course C inner join tbl_subject S on c.fk_subjectno = S.subjectno where fk_memberno = #{memberno} and courseyear = #{year} and semester = #{cursemester}
select day from tbl_course C inner join tbl_subject S on c.fk_subjectno = S.subjectno where fk_memberno = #{memberNo} and courseyear = #{year} and semester = #{currentsemester}
select period from tbl_course C inner join tbl_subject S on c.fk_subjectno = S.subjectno where fk_memberno = #{memberNo} and courseyear = #{year} and semester = #{currentsemester}
select count(*) from tbl_course C inner join tbl_subject S on c.fk_subjectno = S.subjectno where fk_memberno = #{memberNo} and subjectno = #{subjectno} and recourse = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_official_leave(leaveno, startdate, enddate, starttime, endtime, reason, fk_memberno) values(tbl_official_leave_seq.nextval, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{reason}, #{fk_memberNo})
insert into tbl_official_leave(leaveno, startdate, enddate, reason, fk_memberno) values(tbl_official_leave_seq.nextval, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{reason}, #{fk_memberNo})

insert into tbl_official_leave(leaveno, startdate, enddate, starttime, endtime, reason, fk_memberno, filename, orgfilename, filesize) values(tbl_official_leave_seq.nextval, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{reason}, #{fk_memberNo}, #{fileName}, #{orgFileName}, #{fileSize})

insert into tbl_official_leave(leaveno, startdate, enddate, reason, fk_memberno, filename, orgfilename, filesize) values(tbl_official_leave_seq.nextval, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{reason}, #{fk_memberNo}, #{fileName}, #{orgFileName}, #{fileSize})
mapper.select: select leaveNo, to_char(startDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate, to_char(endDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate, reason, approve, approveDate, noReason, to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regdate from tbl_official_leave where add_months(sysdate, -3) <= regdate and fk_memberno = #{string} order by regdate desc

select name, memberno, grade, deptname, filename, orgfilename, filesize, leaveNo, startDate, endDate, reason, approve, approveDate, noReason from ( select rownum as rno, name, memberno, grade, deptname, filename, orgfilename, filesize, leaveNo, startDate, endDate, reason, approve, approveDate, noReason, regdate, regyear, regmonth from ( select name, memberno, grade, deptname, filename, orgfilename, filesize, leaveNo, to_char(startDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate, to_char(regdate, 'yyyy') as regyear,to_char(regdate, 'mm') as regmonth, to_char(endDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate, reason, approve, approveDate, noReason, to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regdate from ( select name, memberno, grade, deptname from tbl_member M inner join tbl_dept D on M.fk_deptseq = D.deptseq )V inner join tbl_official_leave O on V.memberno = O.fk_memberno where fk_memberno = #{memberno} order by regdate desc ) where approve in ('승인완료','승인취소') and regyear = #{year} and regmonth in (${month}) )
select count(*) from tbl_official_leave where fk_memberno = #{memberno} and (startdate between #{startdate} and #{enddate} or enddate between #{startdate} and #{enddate})
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_girl_leave(girlLeaveNo, startDate, endDate, fk_memberno) values(tbl_girl_leave_seq.nextval, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{fk_memberno})
insert into tbl_girl_leave(girlLeaveNo, startDate, endDate, fk_memberno, startTime, endTime) values(tbl_girl_leave_seq.nextval, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{fk_memberno}, #{startTime}, #{endTime})
mapper.select: select girlLeaveNo, to_char(regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, to_char(startDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate, startTime, endTime, approve, noreason from tbl_girl_leave where add_months(sysdate, -12) <= regdate and fk_memberno = #{memberNo} order by regdate desc

select courseyear, semester, fk_subjectno, subjectname, name, courseno, classchk from ( select courseno, courseyear, semester, fk_subjectno, subjectname, fk_professorno, classchk from tbl_course C inner join tbl_subject S on C.fk_subjectno = S.subjectno where C.fk_memberno = #{memberno} and courseyear=#{year} and semester = #{semester} ) V inner join tbl_professor p on V.fk_professorno = P.professorno
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_class_check(fk_courseno, firstqs, secondqs, thirdqs, fourqs, fiveqs, sixqs, sevenqs, eightqs,checkKind , etc) values(#{fk_courseno}, #{firstQs},#{secondQs}, #{thirdQs}, #{fourQs}, #{fiveQs}, #{sixQs}, #{sevenQs}, #{eightQs}, #{checkKind} , #{etc})
mapper.update: update tbl_course set classchk = '1' where courseno = #{fk_courseno}
mapper.select: select deptseq, currentSemester, name, memberNo, deptName, birth, grade, mobile, email, address, detailaddress, extraaddress, status, graduateok from ( select deptseq, currentSemester, name, memberNo, deptName, birth, grade, mobile, email, address, detailaddress, extraaddress, fk_regseq, graduateok from tbl_member M inner join tbl_dept D on M.fk_deptseq = D.deptseq where memberNo = #{memberNo} )V inner join tbl_school_reg R on V.fk_regseq = R.regseq
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_school_leave(startsemester, schoolLvNo, armytype, armystartdate, armyenddate, filename, orgfilename, filesize, comeSemester, type, fk_memberno) values(#{startSemester}, tbl_school_leave_seq.nextval, #{armyType}, #{armyStartDate}, #{armyEndDate}, #{filename}, #{orgfilename}, #{filesize}, #{comeSemester},'군휴학', #{fk_memberNo})

insert into tbl_school_leave(schoolLvNo, startsemester, endsemester, reason, comesemester, type, fk_memberno) values(tbl_school_leave_seq.nextval, #{startsemester}, #{endsemester}, #{reason}, #{comesemester},'일반휴학', #{memberNo})
mapper.update: update tbl_school_leave set startsemester = #{startSemester}, endsemester = #{endSemester}, reason = #{reason}, comesemester = #{comeSemester} where schoolLvNo = #{schoolLvNo}
mapper.select: select startSemester, to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regdate, type, comeSemester, to_char(armyStartDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as armyStartDate, to_char(armyEndDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as armyEndDate from tbl_school_leave where fk_memberno = #{memberno} and comesemester = #{comesem} and comeSchool = 0
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_come_school(comeseq, comesemester, type, fk_memberno) values(tbl_come_school_seq.nextval, #{comesemester}, #{type}, #{memberno})

insert into tbl_come_school(comeseq, comesemester, type, fk_memberno, filename, orgfilename, filesize) values(tbl_come_school_seq.nextval, #{comeSemester}, #{type}, #{fk_Memberno}, #{fileName}, #{orgFileName}, #{fileSize})
mapper.select: select deptname, subjectname, subjectno, name, credits, day, period, peoplecnt, grade, curpeoplecnt, subssemester from ( select p.name, subjectno, subjectname, credits, day, period, peoplecnt, fk_deptseq, grade, curpeoplecnt, subssemester from tbl_subject S inner join tbl_professor P on S.fk_professorno = p.professorno where subjectno = #{no} ) V inner join tbl_dept D on V.fk_deptseq = D.deptseq
select subjectname from tbl_subject where muststatus = '0' and (fk_deptseq = #{deptseq} or fk_deptseq = '23')
select subjectname from tbl_subject S inner join tbl_course C on S.subjectno = C.fk_subjectno where C.fk_memberno = #{memberNo} and muststatus = '0'
select fk_deptseq from tbl_subject where muststatus = '0' and (fk_deptseq = '2' or fk_deptseq = '23')
update tbl_member set graduateok = '1' where memberno = #{memberNo}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_graduate_delay(delayNo, reason, startsem, endsem, fk_memberno) values(tbl_graduate_delay_seq.nextval, #{reason}, #{startSem}, #{endSem}, #{fk_memberno})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_course where fk_memberno=#{memberNo} and score ='F'
select score from tbl_course where fk_memberno=#{memberNo} order by courseno asc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_graduate_early(earlyno, sumcredit, sumsem, avggrade, fk_memberno) values(tbl_graduate_early_seq.nextval, #{sumCredit}, #{sumSem}, #{avgGrade}, #{fk_memberno})
mapper.select: select subjectname from tbl_subject S inner join tbl_course C on S.subjectno = C.fk_subjectno where C.fk_memberno = #{memberno} and courseyear = #{year} and semester = #{semester}

select fk_subjectno, subject, contents, to_char(startdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate, to_char(enddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate, subjectname from ( select subjectno, subjectname from tbl_subject S inner join tbl_course C on S.subjectno = C.fk_subjectno where C.fk_memberno = #{memberno} and courseyear = #{year} and semester = #{semester} )V inner join tbl_homework H on V.subjectno = H.fk_subjectno
